name: Cataphract Command
description: Morning! How's it feel to be strapped to a walking metal coffin at six AM? Bet you wish you studied harder in school! Heh heh heh... Hit that throttle. We're going to be killing people before breakfast today.
author: Savarin Johnson, pilot

name: Ace
description: Morning! How's it feel to be strapped to a metal coffin at six AM? Bet you wish you studied harder in school! Heh heh heh... Hit the throttle. We're going to be killing people before breakfast today.
author: Savarin Johnson, pilot

name: Reactive Motion Sheath
description: It feels wrong at first, like, like the whole machine's slipping out from under you. But if you fight it, you die.
author: ATAC test pilot #047, debrief transcript (redacted)
